actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide investigative authority to the Federal Bureau of Investigation in cases of police killings upon written request from the local enforcement agency.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Bureau of Investigation to investigate the killing of any police officer upon written request from the head of the law enforcement agency of which the officer was a member.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide investigative authority to the Federal Bureau of Investigation in cases of police killings upon written request from the local enforcement agency.
